name: 1Beyt
author: Javad Ahshamian

sections.description:
This plugin can display a Distich from Persian poets in your weblog by wedget and shortcode.

The features of this plugin can be listed as follows:

  • امکان نمایش یک بیت شعر تصادفی در ویجت
  • امکان نمایش بیت با کد کوتاه در هر جای سایت
  • تغییر بیت در هر بار مرور

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload 1beyt.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php echo do_shortcode('[yek_beyt]');?> for Display Distich in your templates
